snippet.title: Sniper Ships: Shoot'em Up on Rails - Trailer
snippet.description:
Dodge bullets and click to destroy enemies with your sniper attack! This is a classic Shoot'em up mixed with Shooter on Rails mechanics! We challenge you to dodge all the shots and destroy all the enemies!

Wishlist it now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1555080/
